comment: Smart Data Models - GovHydro4 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovHydro4/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Hydro turbine and governor. Represents plants with straight-forward penstock configurations and hydraulic governors of traditional 'dashpot' type.  This model can be used to represent simple, Francis, Pelton or Kaplan turbines.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: at
contents.comment: Turbine gain (At).  Typical Value = 1.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: bgv0
contents.comment: Kaplan blade servo point 0 (Bgv0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: bgv1
contents.comment: Kaplan blade servo point 1 (Bgv1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: bgv2
contents.comment: Kaplan blade servo point 2 (Bgv2). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0, Kaplan = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: bgv3
contents.comment: Kaplan blade servo point 3 (Bgv3). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0, Kaplan = 0.667. Default: 0.0

contents.name: bgv4
contents.comment: Kaplan blade servo point 4 (Bgv4).  Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0, Kaplan = 0.9. Default: 0.0

contents.name: bgv5
contents.comment: Kaplan blade servo point 5 (Bgv5). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0, Kaplan = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: bmax
contents.comment: Maximum blade adjustment factor (Bmax). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0, Kaplan = 1.1276. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: db1
contents.comment: Intentional deadband width (db1).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: db2
contents.comment: Unintentional dead-band (db2).  Unit = MW.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: dturb
contents.comment: Turbine damping factor (Dturb).  Unit = delta P (PU of MWbase) / delta speed (PU). Typical Value = 0.5.  Typical Value Francis = 1.1, Kaplan = 1.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: eps
contents.comment: Intentional db hysteresis (eps).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gmax
contents.comment: Maximum gate opening, PU of MWbase (Gmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gmin
contents.comment: Minimum gate opening, PU of MWbase (Gmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv0
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 0, PU gv (Gv0). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.1, Kaplan = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv1
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 1, PU gv (Gv1). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.4, Kaplan = 0.4. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv2
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 2, PU gv (Gv2). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.5, Kaplan = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv3
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 3, PU gv (Gv3). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.7, Kaplan = 0.7. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv4
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 4, PU gv (Gv4). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.8, Kaplan = 0.8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv5
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 5, PU gv (Gv5). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.9, Kaplan = 0.9. Default: 0.0

contents.name: hdam
contents.comment: Head available at dam (hdam).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mwbase
contents.comment: Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pgv0
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 0, PU power (Pgv0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv1
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 1, PU power (Pgv1). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.42, Kaplan = 0.35. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv2
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 2, PU power (Pgv2). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.56, Kaplan = 0.468. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv3
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 3, PU power (Pgv3). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.8, Kaplan = 0.796. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv4
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 4, PU power (Pgv4). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.9, Kaplan = 0.917. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv5
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 5, PU power (Pgv5).  Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.97, Kaplan = 0.99. Default: 0.0

contents.name: qn1
contents.comment: No-load flow at nominal head (Qnl). Typical Value = 0.08.  Typical Value Francis = 0, Kaplan = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rperm
contents.comment: Permanent droop (Rperm).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

contents.name: rtemp
contents.comment: Temporary droop (Rtemp).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tblade
contents.comment: Blade servo time constant (Tblade).  Typical Value = 100. Default: 0

contents.name: tg
contents.comment: Gate servo time constant (Tg) (>0).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

contents.name: tp
contents.comment: Pilot servo time constant (Tp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: tr
contents.comment: Dashpot time constant (Tr) (>0).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

contents.name: tw
contents.comment: Water inertia time constant (Tw) (>0).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: uc
contents.comment: Max gate closing velocity (Uc).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: uo
contents.comment: Max gate opening velocity (Uo).  Typical Vlaue = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
